alert.note: Alert for Marengo (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 1:49PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Marengo County through 230 PM CDT... At 149 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Faunsdale to near Pennington. Movement was northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Demopolis, Linden, Uniontown, Jefferson, Myrtlewood, Faunsdale, Dayton, Pin Hook, Chickasaw State Park and Old Spring Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
